subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Contador extended his overall lead at the Giro d’Italia by seven seconds by finishing third behind the winner Mikel Landa during the mountainous 15th stage.
snippet: Contador extended his overall lead at the Giro d’Italia by seven seconds by finishing third behind the winner Mikel Landa during the mountainous 15th stage.
